translations.en: Allah - The Supreme Being
translations.ur: اللہ - واحد خدا
translations.fr: Allah - Le Dieu Unique

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: The ultimate name encompassing all divine attributes, reminding us of Allah's absolute unity and sovereignty over all creation.

translations.en: The Most Merciful - All-encompassing mercy
translations.id: Yang Maha Pengasih - kasih untuk semua makhluk
translations.ur: رحمان - تمام مخلوقات پر رحم کرنے والا
translations.fr: Le Tout Miséricordieux - miséricorde universelle
translations.sw: Ar-Rahman - mwingi wa rehema kwa wote

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's mercy that encompasses all creation, believers and non-believers alike, manifested in every blessing we receive.

translations.en: The Most Compassionate - Special mercy for believers
translations.id: Yang Maha Penyayang - kasih khusus untuk mukmin
translations.ur: رحیم - مؤمنوں پر خاص رحم کرنے والا
translations.fr: Le Très Miséricordieux - miséricorde spéciale

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: The intensive mercy Allah shows especially to the believers, motivating us to earn His special compassion through faith and good deeds.

translations.en: The King - Supreme ruler of all
translations.ur: بادشاہ - سب کا حاکم
translations.fr: Le Roi - souverain suprême

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Recognition of Allah's absolute sovereignty reminds us to submit humbly to His divine will and governance over all affairs.

translations.en: The Most Holy - Pure from all imperfections
translations.id: Yang Mahasuci - bebas dari segala cacat
translations.ur: قدوس - تمام عیبوں سے پاک
translations.fr: Le Très Saint - pur de toute imperfection

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's absolute purity and holiness inspire us to purify our hearts and actions, striving for spiritual cleanliness in all we do.

translations.en: The Source of Peace - Giver of safety and security
translations.ur: سلامتی دینے والا - امن کا منبع
translations.fr: La Paix - source de sécurité

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: In Allah we find true peace and security, encouraging us to be sources of peace for others and to seek tranquility through His remembrance.

translations.en: The Giver of Security - Bestower of faith and safety
translations.ur: امان دینے والا - ایمان عطا کرنے والا
translations.fr: Le Fidèle - donneur de sécurité

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah grants us faith and security, reminding us to be trustworthy and to provide comfort and assurance to those around us.

translations.en: The Guardian - Protector and overseer
translations.ur: نگہبان - محافظ اور نگران
translations.fr: Le Gardien - protecteur et surveillant

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah watches over and protects all creation, inspiring us to be responsible guardians of what He has entrusted to our care.

translations.en: The Mighty - Invincible and honorable
translations.ur: غالب - ناقابل شکست اور معزز
translations.fr: Le Puissant - invincible et honorable

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's might and honor remind us that true strength comes from Him, and we should seek dignity through righteousness and faith.

translations.en: The Compeller - Irresistible force, mender of broken
translations.ur: جبار - ٹوٹے ہوئے کو جوڑنے والا
translations.fr: Le Contraignant - réparateur des brisés

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah mends our broken hearts and spirits, reminding us that He can repair what seems irreparable in our lives and souls.

translations.en: The Majestic - Supreme in greatness
translations.id: Yang Maha Agung - tinggi dalam keagungan
translations.ur: سب سے بڑا - عظمت میں بلند
translations.fr: Le Superbe - suprême en grandeur

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Only Allah has the right to true greatness and majesty, teaching us humility and warning against arrogance in our dealings with others.

translations.en: The Creator - Originator of all existence
translations.ar: الخالق - موجد كل شيء من العدم
translations.ur: خالق - تمام وجود کا موجد
translations.fr: Le Créateur - origine de toute existence

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Acknowledging Allah as our Creator fills us with gratitude and purpose, recognizing our responsibility as His creations to worship and serve Him.

translations.en: The Maker - Fashioner from nothing
translations.ur: بنانے والا - عدم سے وجود میں لانے والا
translations.fr: Le Créateur - façonneur du néant

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah creates everything from nothingness, reminding us of His absolute power and our complete dependence on His creative will.

translations.en: The Fashioner - Shaper of all forms
translations.ur: شکل دینے والا - صورت بنانے والا
translations.fr: Le Formateur - donneur de formes

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah shapes us in the most beautiful forms, inspiring us to beautify our character and actions to reflect His divine artistry.

translations.en: The Oft-Forgiving - Repeatedly forgiving sins
translations.ur: بہت معاف کرنے والا - بار بار گناہ معاف کرنے والا
translations.fr: Le Grand Pardonneur - pardonnant répétitivement
translations.sw: Al-Ghaffar - mwenye kusamehe mara kwa mara

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's repeated forgiveness gives us hope and encourages us to turn to Him in repentance, no matter how often we fall short.

translations.en: The Subduer - Dominant over all
translations.id: Yang Maha Menguasai - berkuasa atas segalanya
translations.ur: قاہر - سب پر غالب
translations.fr: Le Dominateur - dominant sur tout
translations.hi: अल-क़हार - सबको वश में करने वाला

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's absolute dominance reminds us that all power belongs to Him alone, encouraging humble submission to His divine authority.

translations.en: The Bestower - Generous giver of gifts
translations.ur: بہت دینے والا - فیاض عطا کرنے والا
translations.fr: Le Grand Donateur - généreux donneur

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's endless generosity inspires us to be generous with others and to recognize that all we have comes from His bounty.

translations.en: The Provider - Sustainer of all creation
translations.ur: رزق دینے والا - تمام مخلوق کا رازق
translations.fr: Le Pourvoyeur - nourrisseur de toute création
translations.hi: अर-रज़्ज़ाक़ - सभी को जीविका देने वाला

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Trusting in Allah as our Provider brings peace to our hearts and frees us from excessive worry about worldly sustenance.

translations.en: The Opener - Opens doors and grants victory
translations.id: Pembuka - membuka pintu dan memberi kemenangan
translations.ur: کھولنے والا - راہیں کھولنے والا
translations.tr: Fettah - kapıları açan ve zafer veren
translations.fr: L'Ouvreur - ouvre les portes et accorde la victoire
translations.ru: Открывающий - открывает двери и дарует победу
translations.fa: فتاح - گشاینده راه‌ها و دهنده پیروزی
translations.ms: Al-Fattah - pembuka pintu dan pemberi kemenangan
translations.sw: Al-Fattah - mfunguzi wa milango na mtoaji wa ushindi
translations.bn: আল-ফাত্তাহ - দরজা খোলার এবং বিজয় দানকারী

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: When we face closed doors in life, we turn to Allah the Opener, trusting Him to provide solutions and new opportunities.

translations.en: The All-Knowing - Perfect knowledge of everything
translations.ur: سب کچھ جاننے والا - کامل علم رکھنے والا
translations.fr: L'Omniscient - connaissance parfaite de tout

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's perfect knowledge comforts us, knowing that He understands our struggles and guides us with complete wisdom.

translations.en: The Constrictor - Withholds according to wisdom
translations.ur: روکنے والا - حکمت سے کنٹرول کرنے والا
translations.fr: Le Restricteur - retient selon la sagesse

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: When Allah withholds something from us, we trust it's for our benefit, teaching us patience and contentment with His divine plan.

translations.en: The Extender - Expands provision and mercy
translations.id: Yang Melapangkan - meluaskan rezeki dan rahmat
translations.ur: وسعت دینے والا - رزق اور رحمت بڑھانے والا
translations.fr: L'Étendeur - élargit la provision et la miséricorde
translations.fa: باسط - گسترش دهنده روزی و رحمت
translations.hi: अल-बासित - रोज़ी और रहमत बढ़ाने वाला
translations.sw: Al-Basit - mpanuzi wa riziki na rehema

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah expands our provisions when it benefits us, encouraging gratitude for abundance and generosity toward others.

translations.en: The Abaser - Lowers the arrogant with justice
translations.id: Yang Merendahkan - merendahkan yang sombong dengan adil
translations.ur: پست کرنے والا - مغروروں کو انصاف سے نیچا کرنے والا
translations.fr: L'Abaisseur - abaisse les arrogants avec justice
translations.fa: خافض - فروتن کننده متکبران با عدالت
translations.hi: अल-ख़ाफ़िज़ - अहंकारियों को न्याय से नीचा करने वाला
translations.ms: Al-Khafid - merendahkan yang sombong dengan adil
translations.sw: Al-Khafid - ashushaye wenye kiburi kwa haki

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: This reminds us to remain humble, as Allah can humble the proud and that true honor comes from righteousness, not arrogance.

translations.en: The Exalter - Raises the humble in ranks
translations.id: Yang Meninggikan - mengangkat derajat yang rendah hati
translations.ur: بلند کرنے والا - عاجزوں کے درجات بلند کرنے والا
translations.fr: L'Éleveur - élève les humbles en rang
translations.hi: अर-राफ़ि - विनम्रों के दर्जे बुलंद करने वाला
translations.ms: Ar-Rafi' - meninggikan darjat yang rendah hati

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah elevates those who are humble and righteous, inspiring us to seek honor through good deeds and modesty.

translations.en: The Bestower of Honor - Grants dignity and respect
translations.ur: عزت دینے والا - وقار اور احترام عطا کرنے والا
translations.fr: Le Donneur d'Honneur - accorde dignité et respect
translations.sw: Al-Mu'izz - mtoaji wa heshima na ukuu

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: True honor comes from Allah alone, encouraging us to seek dignity through faith and righteous deeds rather than worldly status.

translations.en: The Humiliator - Humbles the unjust with wisdom
translations.id: Yang Menghinakan - merendahkan yang zalim dengan hikmah
translations.ur: ذلت دینے والا - ظالموں کو حکمت سے ذلیل کرنے والا
translations.fr: L'Humiliateur - humilie les injustes avec sagesse
translations.fa: مذل - خوار کننده ستمگران با حکمت
translations.hi: अल-मुज़िल्ल - अन्यायियों को हिकमत से ज़लील करने वाला
translations.ms: Al-Mudhill - menghinakan yang zalim dengan hikmah
translations.sw: Al-Mudhill - adhibuye wenye dhuluma kwa hekima

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's justice includes humbling those who abuse their power, reminding us to use any authority we have with fairness and compassion.

translations.en: The All-Hearing - Hears every sound and prayer
translations.id: Maha Mendengar - mendengar setiap suara dan doa
translations.ur: سب کچھ سننے والا - ہر آواز اور دعا سننے والا
translations.tr: Semi - her sesi ve duayı duyan
translations.fr: L'Audient - entend chaque son et prière
translations.ru: Всеслышащий - слышит каждый звук и молитву
translations.fa: سمیع - شنونده هر صدا و دعا
translations.hi: अस-समी - हर आवाज़ और दुआ सुनने वाला
translations.ms: As-Sami' - mendengar setiap suara dan doa
translations.sw: As-Sami' - asikiaye kila sauti na dua
translations.bn: আস-সামী - প্রতিটি শব্দ ও দোয়া শ্রবণকারী

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Knowing Allah hears our every word and prayer brings comfort in difficulty and encourages us to speak with kindness and truth.

translations.en: The All-Seeing - Sees everything visible and hidden
translations.id: Maha Melihat - melihat segala yang tampak dan tersembunyi
translations.ur: سب کچھ دیکھنے والا - ظاہر اور چھپے کو دیکھنے والا
translations.tr: Basir - görünür ve gizli her şeyi gören
translations.fr: Le Clairvoyant - voit tout visible et caché
translations.ru: Всевидящий - видит все видимое и скрытое
translations.fa: بصیر - بیننده همه ظاهر و باطن
translations.hi: अल-बसीर - हर दिखाई और छुपी चीज़ देखने वाला
translations.ms: Al-Basir - melihat segala yang zahir dan batin
translations.sw: Al-Basir - muonaye kila kilichoonekana na kilichofichiwa
translations.bn: আল-বাসীর - প্রকাশ্য ও গোপন সবকিছু দর্শনকারী

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah sees our every action and intention, motivating us to maintain good character both publicly and privately.

translations.en: The Judge - Ultimate arbiter of justice
translations.ur: فیصلہ کرنے والا - انصاف کا حتمی فیصلہ کن
translations.fr: Le Juge - arbitre ultime de la justice

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's perfect judgment reminds us to be fair in our dealings and to trust His ultimate justice in all matters.

translations.en: The Just - Perfectly fair and equitable
translations.ur: انصاف کرنے والا - مکمل طور پر منصف
translations.fr: Le Juste - parfaitement équitable

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's perfect justice inspires us to uphold fairness in all our relationships and decisions, treating everyone with equity.

translations.en: The Gentle - Kind and subtle in His care
translations.id: Maha Halus - lembut dan teliti dalam pemeliharaan
translations.ur: نرم مہربان - رعایت میں نرمی اور باریک بینی
translations.fr: Le Bienveillant - doux et subtil dans ses soins
translations.ru: Мягкий - добрый и тонкий в заботе
translations.fa: لطیف - مهربان و ظریف در مراقبت
translations.hi: अल-लतीफ़ - देखभाल में कोमल और सूक्ष्म
translations.ms: Al-Latif - lembut dan halus dalam pemeliharaan
translations.sw: Al-Latif - mpole na mwangalifu katika utunzaji

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's gentleness in guiding and caring for us teaches us to approach others with kindness and sensitivity.

translations.en: The All-Aware - Fully informed of all details
translations.id: Maha Mengetahui - sepenuhnya mengetahui semua detail
translations.ur: خبردار - تمام تفصیلات سے باخبر
translations.fr: L'Informé - pleinement informé de tous les détails
translations.ru: Сведущий - полностью осведомлен обо всех деталях
translations.hi: अल-ख़बीर - सभी विवरणों से पूर्णतः अवगत
translations.sw: Al-Khabir - mjuzi kamili wa maelezo yote

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's complete awareness of our circumstances brings comfort, knowing He understands our situation perfectly and guides accordingly.

translations.en: The Forbearing - Patient despite our shortcomings
translations.id: Maha Penyabar - sabar meski kita banyak kekurangan
translations.ur: بردبار - ہماری کمزوریوں کے باوجود صابر
translations.fr: Le Patient - patient malgré nos défauts
translations.ru: Терпеливый - терпелив несмотря на наши недостатки
translations.hi: अल-हलीम - हमारी कमियों के बावजूद धैर्यवान
translations.ms: Al-Halim - sabar walaupun kita banyak kekurangan
translations.sw: Al-Halim - mvumilivu licha ya mapungufu yetu

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's patience with our mistakes encourages us to be patient with others and to continuously seek His forgiveness and improvement.

translations.en: The Magnificent - Incomparably great and majestic
translations.id: Maha Agung - keagungan yang tak tertandingi
translations.ur: عظیم - بے مثال عظمت اور جلال والا
translations.fr: Le Magnifique - grandeur et majesté incomparables
translations.sw: Al-Azim - ukuu na utukufu usio na kifani

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Contemplating Allah's magnificent greatness humbles our hearts and fills us with awe, inspiring reverence in our worship and conduct.

translations.en: The Forgiving - Covers and pardons our sins
translations.id: Maha Pengampun - menutupi dan memaafkan dosa
translations.ur: بخشنے والا - گناہوں کو چھپانے اور معاف کرنے والا
translations.fr: Le Pardonneur - couvre et pardonne nos péchés
translations.ru: Прощающий - покрывает и прощает наши грехи
translations.hi: अल-ग़फ़ूर - हमारे पापों को ढाँकने और क्षमा करने वाला
translations.sw: Al-Ghafur - afichaye na kusamehe dhambi zetu
translations.bn: আল-গাফুর - আমাদের পাপসমূহ আবৃতকারী ও ক্ষমাকারী

asmaUlHusna.shortReflection: Allah's immense forgiveness motivates us to sincerely repent and to forgive others, knowing He is the ultimate source of pardon.
